name: King of the Rats
description:
You are the monarch of a glorious rat kingdom! But suddenly, you face the onslaught of endless waves of cat soldiers... Can you reinforce your defenses to protect your kingdom? Can you manage your money efficiently to ensure your kingdom's survival?

Game Description

Cartoonish-themed rat-centric tower defense survival game. The player generates money each round for towers. They need to decide which types of towers to place down and where to place them in order to maximize how long their empire lasts.

Credits

Artist/Designer/Playtest Runner - Aylish Turner

Programmer/Designer/Playtest Runner - Spencer Chang

Audio Producer/Composer - James Gillen

Composer - Gabriel DeBenedict

Sound Design - Noah Brown

Controls

Use the mouse wheel or the keys Q and E to scroll through each different tower type. Left mouse click to place a tower down (if you have enough money to purchase it). To sell a tower, hover over it with the cursor and press the S key. ESC key pauses the game.

3rd Party Assets

Sell sound effect and Grapeshot tower fire effect, are from soundsnap.com
